name: Corona Fighter (Awsm-code)
description: WHAT ? This is my first project I've ever done. GOAL ? Score 1000 Points and finish the game. What is this game about?  A game in which we fight the Corona virus. What are we ?  In this game, we are Cologne and we kill viruses. Here are the default one controls. Movement = (Up/Left/Right) Fire = (Space) Fullscreen = (F11) Exit = (ESC) Start = (Enter) Install instructions +Only for Window's. +Zip version require no setup's, click and play.
